text: The Portugal national under-21 football team is the national under-21 football team of Portugal. It is controlled by the Portuguese Football Federation (FPF). They are nicknamed "Esperanças," which means hope, as they are Portugal's hopes for the future. ==Competitive record== ===UEFA European Under-21 Championship=== Year Round Position Games Won Drawn
